#summary Readme page for the project

= Introduction =

This project should contains the source code for any Oracle Service Bus utilities that can be shared. Further updates to this page will be made when appropriate.

At present this project contains the following sub-projects:

|| XmlCacheUtility || Provides a XML caching mechanism. A disk-based implementation is provided ||
|| XQTestFramework || Provides a framework to ease the production of automated JUnit tests for XQuery transformations
